title: Workout of the Week: Massive Sprint Power at the Giro d’Italia
content:
With little in the way of strong leadout trains, we're seeing extended sprints from Jonathan Milan, Tim Merlier, and Olav Kooij for flat stage victories at this year's Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Workout of the Week: Massive Sprint Power at the Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
